Key Match Events: Trevor Larnach dropped a looping liner just in front of a hard-charging Jarred Kelenic in left field, tying the game at 4
The Braves put together a string of professional at-bats to beat Jhoan Duran in the 10th inning
Post-Match Reflections: Atlanta manager Brian Snitker said, 'That's a good win. It was going to be a costly loss, quite honestly. Now, it's a good win.'
Travis d'Arnaud said, 'I don't try to do too much. I just try to stay up the middle and if it happens, it happens.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Atlanta has now won eight of their last 10 games and has four extra-inning wins in the month of August
Travis d'Arnaud has driven in runs in the 10th inning in three of the Braves' extra-inning wins this month
Others: Atlanta will send NL Cy Young candidate Chris Sale to the mound on Wednesday night as they look to sweep the Twins
